pr_title: TRUNK-5181: State password rules on installation wizard page

timeline.bodyText: Can you do proper formatting of different tags so that they can be easily viewed? On a glimpse they appear to be jumbled.
timeline.author: Am-Coder
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,7 +21,16 @@ $l10n.get("install.advanced.admin.password.retype"): - + + + $l10n.get("install.advanced.admin.password.constraints") :
+ $l10n.get("install.advanced.admin.password.constraints.min.length")
+ $l10n.get("install.advanced.admin.password.constraints.cases")
+ $l10n.get("install.advanced.admin.password.constraints.numbers")
+ $l10n.get("install.advanced.admin.password.constraints.username")
+ + +

replies.bodyText:
Done. Check it now, please.  😇
The tables itself not properly formatted. I didn't format the lines because it's hard to review that formatting fixed.
replies.author: jayasanka-sack

timeline.bodyText: Contains numbers appears to be a vague statement. Shouldn't it be like "Contains at least one number".?
timeline.author: Am-Coder
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -2944,6 +2944,11 @@ install.advanced.other.update=Do you want updates to the database to be automati install.advanced.admin=Step 4 of 5 install.advanced.admin.password.info=Currently the default administrator user/pass is admin:test. Please specify a new password for that user install.advanced.admin.password.retype=Retype password +install.advanced.admin.password.constraints=Your Password should follow the following constraints +install.advanced.admin.password.constraints.min.length=Contains minimum 8 characters +install.advanced.admin.password.constraints.cases=Contains both upper and lowercase letters +install.advanced.admin.password.constraints.numbers=Contains numbers

replies.bodyText: Yes that's sounds good. I'll change that. Thanks @Am-Coder!
replies.author: jayasanka-sack
